alert.note: Alert for Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:27AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Scott and southwestern Yell Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1227 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gravelly, or 21 miles southwest of Danville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Plainview in Yell County... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Carter Cove Park... Union Hill... Wing... Macedonia in Yell County... Waltreak... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Nola... Onyx... Fourche Mountain Recreation Are... Briggsville... Blue Ball... Sunlight Bay Park... Harvey... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central and western Arkansas.
